name: Block And Shoot
description:
WASD = Move

Mouse = Aim

Left Pressed = Fire

Left Released = Shield

You play the game as the title suggests, blocking enemy projectiles and shooting your own right back at them. Unfortunately, due to my conflicting work schedule, I was unable to polish aspects of the game such as the art style, game momentum, scoring, and audio quality. Despite some of the game's short comings, I hope that the key concepts of the game came across well. Please feel free to give honest criticism to help me improve in all future projects.

The game was made using GameMaker Studio

 All sounds were made using BeepBox 2.1.3
